CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 6, 1948, p. 2, reads: "Doing His Duty - Duke C. Finch, 104-year-old resident of the Bedford Dwellings, stops to chat with Legislator Homer S. Brown, en route to the polls to 'do his duty.' Mr. Finch, who has witnessed the growth and development of this country since slavery times, is an ardent advocate of the use of the ballot. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Centenarian Duke C. Finch shaking hands with Homer S. Brown, in polling place
